mapper.select: SELECT tb_product.product_id,tb_product.`product_name`,tb_product.product_details,tb_product.sales,tb_product.`longegral`, tb_skuname.skuname_id,tb_skuname.`skuname_name`,tb_skuvalue.skuvalue_id,tb_skuvalue.`skuvalue_value`, tb_sku.sku_id,tb_sku.stock,tb_sku.original_price,tb_sku.present_price, tb_image.image_id,tb_image.image_path FROM `tb_product` INNER JOIN tb_sku ON tb_product.`product_id`=tb_sku.`product_id` LEFT JOIN tb_skuname ON tb_sku.`product_id`=tb_skuname.`product_id` LEFT JOIN tb_skuvalue ON tb_skuvalue.`skuname_id`=tb_skuname.`skuname_id` INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_image WHERE `image_type`=0) AS tb_image ON tb_image.`product_id`=tb_product.`product_id` WHERE tb_product.product_id=#{productid}

SELECT product_id,product_name,sales,typevalue_id,spare_one FROM tb_product
AND product_name LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{productName},'%')
ORDER BY sales DESC
ORDER BY spare_one DESC

SELECT product_id,product_name,sales,typevalue_id,spare_one FROM tb_product
AND product_name LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{productName},'%')
ORDER BY sales

SELECT tbpr.product_id, tbpr.product_name, tbpr.sales, tbpr.spare_one, tbimg.image_path, tbsku.present_price, tbcomm.countid FROM tb_product tbpr LEFT JOIN tb_Image tbimg ON tbpr.product_id = tbimg.product_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sku.product_id,sku.present_price FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_sku ORDER BY present_price) sku GROUP BY product_id) tbsku ON tbsku.product_id = tbpr.product_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tb_sku.product_id pid,COUNT(tb_comment.comment_id) countid FROM tb_sku LEFT JOIN tb_comment ON tb_sku.sku_id =tb_comment.sku_id GROUP BY tb_sku.product_id) tbcomm ON tbcomm.pid = tbpr.`product_id`
WHERE tbpr.product_name LIKE concat('%',#{product_name},'%')
GROUP BY tbpr.product_id
ORDER BY tbpr.sales
ORDER BY tbpr.sales DESC
ORDER BY tbcomm.countid
ORDER BY tbcomm.countid DESC
ORDER BY tbsku.present_price
ORDER BY tbsku.present_price DESC
